welcome_benefits: ₹250 gift voucher on your 1st HPCL fuel transaction above ₹250 and up to 5% cashback (up to ₹1,000 capped) on the transaction value of the first EMI.

Rewards Rate: Save up to 5% on your fuel spending. Save 2.5% as a reward on your utility and grocery expenses. 2.5% as a reward on your IDFC FASTag recharge. 2x rewards on all other retail spend.
Reward Redemption: You can pay for both online and offline transactions at select merchants instantly with your Reward Points. Redeem reward points for membership and gift vouchers of your favorite brands or for products on IDFC Bank’s Reward Redemption Catalog portal.
Insurance Benefits: Get personal accident cover worth ₹2 Lakhs and lost card liability cover worth ₹25,000

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal fee is waived on spending ₹50,000 in the card anniversary year
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver capped at a maximum of ₹100 per month

product_details: Save up to 5% on fuel expenses up to a maximum of ₹5,000 per month.
Save up to 2.5% on utility expenses and grocery spends up to a maximum of ₹4,000 per month.
Save up to 2.5% on IDFC FASTag recharge up to a maximum of ₹2,000 per month.
2x reward points on other retail spend.
Get a ₹250 gift voucher on your 1st HPCL transaction of at least ₹250 or more.
Personal accident insurance cover worth ₹2 Lakhs.
